discussion.content:
Correct answers

As of April 1, 2023, Microsoft no longer accept checks as a payment method for subscriptions paid by invoice.

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT
-

For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

//IMG//

DRAG DROP
-

A company is evaluating Microsoft 365 and Microsoft Entra solutions.

You need to describe the External Identities features in Microsoft Entra,

Match each External identity to its capability.

To answer, move the appropriate External Identity from the column on the left to its capability on the right. You may use each External Identity once, more than once, or not at all.

NOTE: Each correct match is worth one point.

//IMG//

Note: The question is included in a number of questions that depicts the identical set-up. However, every question has a distinctive result. Establish if the solution satisfies the requirements.
You have been tasked with deploying Microsoft Office to company using a subscription-based licensing model.
The version of Office you deploy should allow for Office application settings to be enforced via group policy.
Solution: You deploy Office 365 ProPlus.
Does the solution meet the goal?

discussion.content: Sept 30, 2021 — Office 365 ProPlus is being renamed to Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise

Sim, a solução atende ao objetivo. O Office 365 ProPlus é a versão do Microsoft Office baseada em assinatura que é projetada para uso empresarial. Essa versão permite que as configurações do aplicativo do Office sejam aplicadas por meio de políticas de grupo em um ambiente empresarial. Portanto, ao implantar o Office 365 ProPlus, você poderá gerenciar e configurar as configurações do Office de acordo com as necessidades da empresa usando políticas de grupo, o que é compatível com o modelo de licenciamento baseado em assinatura. A resposta correta é:

R. Sim
Answer A is correct. It is subscription based.
Office 365 ProPlus is a desktop portion of an M365 subscription that is installed on a computer and can be managed via GPO in a hybrid environment.

Also it is said that group policy is related to On prem ADDS environments.
 Office 365 pro plus however is a cloud based environment managed by Azure AD.
Correct. Only Office 365 can be on subscription base.

questions.question_text:
A company is investigating Microsoft 365 support options.

The company has the following requirements:

• All day, every day technical support
• A dedicated Microsoft Customer Success Account Manager
• Advisory support
• Technical training

You need to recommend a support option that meets the requirements.

Which option should you recommend?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Answer is correct

Microsoft Unified Support is designed for enterprises needing premium, 24/7 technical support with additional benefits:

- 24/7 Technical Support – All-day, every-day assistance for critical issues.
- Dedicated Customer Success Account Manager (CSAM) – Acts as a single point of contact for strategic guidance.
- Proactive Advisory Support – Includes best practices, architecture reviews, and optimization.
-Technical Training & Workshops – Customized training for IT teams.

https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/unifiedsupport

Selected Answer: C
chatgpt:
Microsoft provides service credits based on the uptime percentage as defined in the Microsoft Online Services Service Level Agreement (SLA).

Microsoft 365 SLA for Uptime and Service Credits:
99.9% or higher = No credit

99.0% – 99.9% = 25% service credit

95.0% – 99.0% = 50% service credit

Less than 95.0% = 100% service credit

Your Scenario:
The CSP reported a 97% uptime for the previous month.

97% falls between 95.0% and 99.0% uptime, so you are eligible for a 50% service credit.

Answer:
✅ 50% service credit should be received from Microsoft.

questions.question_text:
You are using Microsoft 365 services with a Cloud Services Provider (CSP).

The CSP informs you that the monthly uptime of your Microsoft 365 services for the previous month was 97%.

You need to determine the service credit that you should receive from Microsoft.

Which service credit percentage should you receive?
